attributes.action: Driving instructors to be classed as KEY workers
attributes.additional_details: If we don’t change this now the knock effect will be so much worse and the uk will struggle with providing all the services that need drivers in the future. Driving instructors need to be seen as KEY workers.
attributes.background: Keep Driving instructors working and realise how our jobs are KEY for the future KEY worker roles, Food deliveries., Carer’s , Doctors, Nurses, Public transport etc the list goes on. Look further ahead and see how in years to come this will affect our economy And All the above important people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
